snippet: The Commerce Department said it would delay by at least a year its plan to cede authority over the global address system for the web.
abstract: Commerce Dept announces it will delay plans to transfer authority of Internet domain name system to international governing body for at least one year; will instead continue to work with Internet Corp for Assigned Names and Numbers, or Icann, to assign names and numbers to web's global address system.
lead_paragraph: The Commerce Department said it would delay by at least a year its plan to cede authority over the global address system for the web.

headline.main: U.S. Transfer of Internet Oversight Is Delayed
headline.print_headline: Transfer of Internet Oversight Is Delayed

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Internet Corp for Assigned Names and Numbers
